source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Drawing and Colouring: Birds and Flowers (Art as Meditation)
items.headline: Drawing and Colouring: Birds and Flowers (Art as Meditation)
objectives_summary: You will learn to take inspiration from nature to create art.

items.title: Self-Publishing 101
items.headline: Things to Consider Before Publishing Your Book in Print
objectives_summary: Explanation of print-on-demand publishing and how it differs from offset printing
Information about copyright and legalities to consider when self-publishing
Sections to possibly include in books with details about front matter, body, and back matter

items.title: How to be highly creative in your field ?
items.headline: Are You an undiscovered creative genius ? May be? Let's try
objectives_summary: Understand creativity and the impact of creative talent differences;
Leverage their individual creativity style’s strengths, while compensating for its associated weakness,
Develop and apply more creative approaches to strategic planning and workplace change.

items.title: 3 simple steps to solve a 2*2 Rubik's cube!
items.headline: Learn how to solve a 2*2 Rubiks Cube. Learn the steps & algorithms from how to videos and a downloadable algorithm image
objectives_summary: A 2*2 rubik's Cube

items.title: Introduction to the Art of Comedy
items.headline: On laughter, comic tricks and joke making mechanisms
objectives_summary: be able to understand that comedy means and what are its elements,  how good comedies are made and make jokes of their own.

Looking into the art of cinematic comedy, we may identify a lot of "laughter thematics", "laugther tricks" used, as well as techniques, to render our joke even funnier. In addition, one could identify certain mechanisms for making jokes. To this end, objective of the class is to: a)analyze the theory on laughter: why do we laugh , b)talk about the first organised comedy ever, c)look into existing writers' techniques, d)look into the types of comedies that exist , e)talk about comic tricks , f)analyse joke-making mechanisms.

items.headline: How to Publish Your Novel on Amazon Using Kindle Create
objectives_summary: In this course you will find step by step instructions on how to use Kindle Create to publish both your eBook and paperback on the Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) platform.

items.title: Effective Critical Thinking and Decision Making Training
items.headline: Enhance your critical thinking, decision making and problem solving skills under pressure through this training course.

Study the Critical Thinking, Problem Solving and Decision Making at your own pace

items.title: Creative Writing: Write Your Novel By Watching Movies First
items.headline: 11 Tips from Popular Films from the 70s, 80s, and 90s
objectives_summary: Students will take away fiction writing techniques not found in typical writing courses
Students will be able to immediately implement effective changes in their revision process

objectives_summary: Develop stories from scratch with a universal plot template

Electrify stodgy prose using the principle of "show don't tell"

items.title: Novel Writing-How to write an exciting novel.
items.headline: Transform your Stories, Memoirs, Biographies Movie scripts, Books, Essays and Narratives from ordinary to extraordinary
objectives_summary: How to write creatively in an exciting and descriptive manner.
How to describe your characters and setting creatively.
How to use the key elements of a story i.e. suspense, conflict, surprise, humor, emotions, sensory details and dialogue to keep the reader engrossed in your story.

items.title: Seeing like an abstract artist
items.headline: Learn to find inspiration everywhere and turn it into great abstracts
objectives_summary: You will learn how to look for abstracts by looking around you

items.title: How to Paint a Crashing Wave
items.headline: Seascape Painting in Soft Pastels. Learn to paint water and ocean waves.
objectives_summary: How to use soft pastels to paint a crashing wave. Learn how to use pastels to paint beautiful ocean waves.

Students will have a greater understanding of the anatomy of a wave
